items.sentence: Last year, I couldn\'t spend as much time with my children as I wanted to.
Maybe you need to take a step back and think about why you\'re doing this.
Traffic accidents occur more often when it\'s raining than when it\'s not.
Usually when Tom and Mary go out for dinner together, they split the bill.
I can\'t tell you who\'s on the list because I haven\'t seen the list yet.
Tom put the money he stole in a box that he hid in the back of his closet.
Tom seems to be paying more attention in class today than he usually does.
The girls here just aren\'t as beautiful as the girls back home in Boston.
Tom couldn\'t sleep well last night because it was noisy outside his room.
I know that it is highly unlikely that anyone would be willing to help me.
Don\'t you think it\'s still a little too early to talk to Tom about this?
Tom didn\'t know he didn\'t have enough money to buy everything he needed.
When I was a teenager, I used to visit my grandparents about once a month.
Tom has three sons. One lives in Boston and the other two live in Chicago.
Tom is carrying an umbrella because it was raining when he left his house.
Tom is the type of person who likes to argue just for the sake of arguing.
Tom knew a man whose father was a helicopter pilot during the Vietnam War.
I did take a French class, but I still can\'t understand French very well.
I\'ve already forgotten what time you said the meeting was going to start.
I had to take a bus from Boston because all the flights had been canceled.
